leadership.name: Dr. Elizabeth Khumalo
leadership.qualifications: PhD in Educational Leadership, M.Ed, B.Ed
leadership.bio: Dr. Khumalo has been the principal of Trostsville Primary School since 2015. With over 20 years in education, she is dedicated to fostering a culture of excellence and innovation.

leadership.name: Mr. James van der Merwe
leadership.qualifications: M.Ed, B.Ed, Diploma in School Management
leadership.bio: Mr. van der Merwe oversees curriculum development and teacher support. He has been with the school for 15 years and specializes in mathematics education.

leadership.name: Mrs. Nomsa Ndlovu
leadership.qualifications: B.Ed, Specialized Certificate in Early Childhood Development
leadership.bio: Mrs. Ndlovu brings 18 years of teaching experience to her role leading our Foundation Phase department, focusing on early literacy and numeracy development.

leadership.name: Mr. David Molefe
leadership.bio: Mr. Molefe leads our Intermediate and Senior Phase programs, bringing expertise in science education and curriculum integration across subjects.

teachers.name: Ms. Sarah Thompson
teachers.bio: Ms. Thompson creates a nurturing environment where our youngest learners develop foundational skills through play-based learning.

teachers.name: Mrs. Fatima Ismail
teachers.bio: Mrs. Ismail specializes in early literacy development and differentiated instruction to support diverse learning needs.

teachers.name: Mr. Thabo Mbeki
teachers.bio: Mr. Mbeki employs innovative teaching strategies to develop strong numeracy and literacy foundations in Grade 2 learners.

teachers.name: Ms. Lerato Dlamini
teachers.qualifications: B.Ed, Specialized Certificate in Literacy Development
teachers.bio: Ms. Dlamini prepares learners for the transition to Intermediate Phase by strengthening independent learning skills.

teachers.name: Mr. Andr√© Pretorius
teachers.qualifications: B.Sc, PGCE, Certificate in Mathematics Education
teachers.bio: Mr. Pretorius makes mathematics accessible and engaging through practical applications and problem-solving activities.

teachers.name: Ms. Patricia Naidoo
teachers.bio: Ms. Naidoo fosters a love for language and literature, encouraging critical thinking and creative expression.

teachers.name: Mr. John Simelane
teachers.qualifications: B.Sc, PGCE, Advanced Certificate in Science Education
teachers.bio: Mr. Simelane inspires scientific curiosity through hands-on experiments and inquiry-based learning approaches.

teachers.name: Mrs. Charmaine Botha
teachers.bio: Mrs. Botha prepares learners for high school by developing research skills and critical analysis of historical and geographical concepts.

support.name: Mrs. Gloria Zwane
support.bio: Mrs. Zwane supports the social-emotional well-being of our learners through individual counseling and group programs.

support.name: Mr. Peter Nkosi
support.qualifications: B.Ed in Physical Education, Sports Coaching Certificates
support.bio: Mr. Nkosi oversees our comprehensive sports program, developing physical skills and promoting healthy competition.

support.name: Ms. Joyce Mthembu
support.qualifications: B.Info Science, Certificate in Educational Technology
support.bio: Ms. Mthembu manages our library resources and supports digital literacy development across all grades.

support.name: Mr. Francois du Plessis
support.qualifications: B.Sc in Computer Science, Certificate in Educational Technology
support.bio: Mr. du Plessis ensures that technology enhances learning experiences across our curriculum.

administrative.name: Mrs. Busi Mohale
administrative.qualifications: Diploma in Office Administration, Certificate in School Management
administrative.bio: Mrs. Mohale efficiently manages the school office, serving as the first point of contact for parents and visitors.

administrative.name: Mr. Willem Jansen
administrative.qualifications: B.Com, Certificate in School Financial Management
administrative.bio: Mr. Jansen oversees the school's financial operations, ensuring responsible management of resources.

administrative.name: Ms. Thembi Mahlangu
administrative.bio: Ms. Mahlangu guides families through the application and enrollment process with care and efficiency.
